ygData.subject: Re: Hideous rumor...
ygData.msgSnippet: Good idea.  I wont petition unless I hear to do so from this board then. Drev
ygData.messageBody:
Good idea. I wont petition unless I hear to do so from this board then.

Drev

> ----------
> From: John Cuyle[SMTP:johncuyle@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 11:15 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Hideous rumor...
>
> From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
>
> My opionion is wait and see. I mean, if we KNEW this was going to be in an
> upcomming patch, then feedbacking ahead of time would be fine to ward it
> off. As it stands right now, we would likely just be filling the feedback
> cues with messages asking them not to do something they weren't going to do
> anyway and wasting time that would be better spent fixing actual problems
> with the game. Of course, that's just my opinion.
>
